review_content:
좋게 말해서 이것은 대한민국스타일 맥주이지, 사실상 이것은 맥주가 아닙니다.

말오줌 맥주보다 더 밍밍하고 개성없는 극도의 깔끔한 소맥용 맥주를 만들어놓고선

하이트 테라한테 밀리고, 반일 불매로 줘터지고, 롯데주류에선 클라우드의 옆그레이드격인데 피츠 맥주로는 상위호환인 '클라우드 생 드래프트'라는 자살골까지 이뤄내면서 완전한 고인이 된 비운의 맥주

대한민국 편의점에서 만원에 4캔을 고를 수 있는 선택지 중, 대한민국 대기업 맥주를 고른다는 것은 뷔폐가서 맛있는걸 다 제쳐두고 김밥으로 배를 채우는 셈이죠.
A small can from Chuan Lien down the road. Typical Korean macrobrew; plenty of rather sour vanilla, not disgusting, easy drinking.
Tastes like most Korean lager. Like it is the lager from that grey can Lister carries around in Red Dwarf. ...Very generic and mild tasting. Carbonated and thirst quenching, yet nondescript.
Almost orange amber colour. On the nose, maltish, on the palate more plasticy sort of phenol-accented malt stuff. Ok for industrial Korean swill.

500ml can from TBS in Moscow. Pours clear gold with a medium-sized head that fizzes away in seconds. Aroma is sweet malt and paper. Taste is watery, cooked vegetables and malt. Fizzy almost-beer flavoured water. Rubbish.

Can from Charmy’s Food and Bottleshoo on 17 September 2019. This is my first beer from this South Korean brewery and it was pretty much what I expected. I have no illusions when it comes to Pale Lagers so I know what I am in for when I buy one. Pale straw colour with a rather large fluffy white head of foam. Earthy aroma and a musky flavour. This beer would possibly taste better if I had it on a hot summer’s day after I finished mowing the lawn.
The foamstability is low, bdy gold. The Aroma is malty, metal, old. Taste is malty, soft, metal.
Sweet and papery. Clear gold with a small white head. Malty sweet and a papery finish.
가볍습니다. 너무 가벼워서 오히려 자리가 애매한 국산 타 맥주보다 특징이 뚜렷하네요. 국산 맥주중 가장 가볍게 즐기기 좋은 맥주입니다.

Bottle. Pours a pale golden color with fizzy head and some lacing. Aroma of sweet malts, grain and dash of citrus. Taste of sweet malt, grain, adjunts and bit metallic. Nominal bitterness with a slightly sticky finish. Light body, smooth with minimal flavor. Goes best served ice cold with Korean foods.

Ehhhh, I mean, it's pretty bad. Way over carbonated almost like tonic water with a dabble of rubbing alcohol. Still, it's pretty useful for blasting out spicy Korean food from your taste buds. Must be drunk exceptionally cold.

640ml bottle as Kloud Super Clear. Pours a clear pale light gold, foamy white head that sticks, lots of active carb bubbles. Aroma is metallic with sweet maltiness. Flavor is clean, relatively tasteless, some sweetness, more pronounced than the usual 4.5%er.

Delicious Korean goodness.
It's beer, drink it and enjoy.
Don't overcomplicate it.

Can 500ml. @ [ (PBF XII Tasting.) by oh6gdx ] - Petalax, Finland.

 [ As Kloud Fitz Super Clear ].
Clear light to medium yellow colour with a small, fizzy, fair lacing, mostly diminishing, off-white to white head. Aroma is light moderate malty, pale malt, sweet malt, corn - boiled vegetabes. Flavor is light to moderate sweet with a average duration, pale malt, sweet malt, corn, cooked vegetables - boiled vegetables - cabbage. Body is medium, texture is watery, carbonation is soft. [20180706]

 3-2-3-2-5

500ml can
Clear gold colour with sudsy white head.
Cereal grain aroma.
Sweet bland taste. 
Ho hum.
좋게 말해서 이것은 대한민국스타일 맥주이지, 사실상 이것은 맥주가 아닙니다. 말오줌 맥주보다 더 밍밍하고 개성없는 극도의 깔끔한 소맥용 맥주를 만들어놓고선…
